name: Jigsaw Explorer Save File
summary: Learn about .JIGSAW files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: NOTE: Jigsaw Explorer uses Microsoft Silverlight technology and requires the Silverlight Web browser plug-in to be installed before running the program in the Web browser.

description: Save file created by Jigsaw Explorer, a browser-based jigsaw puzzle program; uses XML formatting and saves the current puzzle; enables puzzles to be saved to the desktop even though the program runs in the browser.
